review:
Looks great ... n stylish too.

Very much upset with the quality of the Strap. Seems to be very cheap and also
was not moving freely and getting stuck at two places. The price is also 20
bucks more than the MRP. The price on the box is 1599 where as the seller
charged 1619. A case can be booked for selling at a price more than the MRP.
The dual is good. The paint also seemed to be of very low quality on the strap
and seems to be coming off or not nicely done between the links.

A great watch. It looks awesome the solid black color gives it a dashing look.
Only complain is no numbering or dots are there, so it's difficult to judge
time sometimes during first few days. Everything else is good about it.

Not Satisfied with the quality of watch, within the use of a month the color
of band started coming out...

Classy watch but three stones on the dial might seem feminine to some. The
metal strap is somewhat flimsy.

As it look here on pictures, better it suits when you put that on wrist. Black
from Sonata at this price, is just perfect! Black goes on all you wear! Buy it
right away buddy... :)

After a week use, scratches on the front dial. Which looks very pathetic. I
better return this.

Size of this watch is fixed and is very large so until and unless you are not
having a good size of hands, you shown't but this watch. And the white colour
of hands of clock is not white they are brown in real.

just one wprd to describe this product. AWESOME!!!!!!!!!  
But sometimes its a little difficult to read the exact time but if your buget
is less than 2000INR GO FOR IT....

Look really nice watch and feel comfortable to wear and specially designed is
